review: The doctor was friendly and to the point. Did not talk about random stuff. Just the problem in hand.

I was mislead into getting screws in my mother's knee...whereas i was told we are going for knee replacement.

Now my mother's knee is worse than before and no ownership is taken by the doctor and the hospital.

He has a very annoying assistant and both are not interested in patients.

I will never recommend him ** **** *** **** ** *** *************** *** don't think about patient.
Very bad experience. Please see any other doctor apart from him.
